attributes.action: Investigate the lack of NHS support to debilitating, if not treated,  mental health problems such as anxiety,depression and panic attacks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having been a sufferer of anxiety and panic attack disorders for more than 35 years, I still find it unacceptable that this area of relatively common complaint receives such scant attention. I have just been referred by my GP to a therapist in the NHS only to be told that I have an 11 1/2 month wait. I felt atrocious a few weeks ago and visited my A&E department only to be told that there was little that can be done, but had I considered yoga!!
The rest really speaks for its self in that I submitted this petition almost 2 weeks ago now, however it was refused on the grounds that it contained a link. Fair enough, but the link was highly critical of the governments present stance, the report was entitled 'A New Deal for Depression and Anxiety Disorders' - from The Centre for Economic Performance's, Mental Health Policy Group. 

Help is all we need!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
